casebody.data:
In the Matter of DILLAHUNT. No. 603P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2004. I. Joe Ivey, Wilson, for Noteholders.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of December 2004 by Petitioner (Dillahunt) for Temporary Stay:

*695"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of December 2004."
